name: reducer-matching
description: A functional redux utility to replace the switch case statement.

scripts.minify: uglifyjs lib/reducerMatching.js --compress --preamble '//reducerMatchingjs, MIT, https://github.com/IsTheJack/reducer-matching' --source-map lib/reducerMatching.min.js.map --in-source-map lib/reducerMatching.js.map --mangle -o lib/reducerMatching.min.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run compile && npm run minify

author: Roberto Oliveira <robertooliveira.dev@gmail.com>
